name: Critical Focus
text: You are trained in the art of causing pain.
benefit: You receive a +4 circumstance bonus on attack rolls made to confirm critical hits.
staminaText: If your successful critical confirmation roll is a natural 19 or 20, you can spend 2 stamina points to roll another confirmation roll. If this confirmation roll also succeeds, increase your critical multiplier by 1 for this attack, and you can roll again. If you continue to roll 19 or 20, you can continue to spend stamina points for additional rolls, and the increases to the critical multiplier stack.
mythicText: Your blows unerringly find your target’s vital spots.
mythicBenefit: You automatically confirm critical threats against non-mythic opponents. In addition, when you threaten a critical hit against a creature wearing armor with the fortification special ability or similar effect, that creature must roll twice and take the worse result when determining critical hit negation.
text_zh: 你熟练于制造疼痛的艺术。
benefit_zh: 在确定重击的攻击检定中，获得+4的环境加值。
mythicText_zh: 你的攻击能够正确无误地命中目标的弱点。
mythicBenefit_zh: 当你对抗非神话敌人时，能够自动确认重击。此外，当你对佩戴具有护命（fortification）特殊能力的护甲或者具有类似效果的生物造成重击威胁时，该名生物必须在确认重击是否无效的检定中掷两次并取更糟的结果。
staminaText_zh: 如果重击确认投出19或20，花费2点耐力可再次确认重击，如果成功，重击伤害倍数+1。你可继续确认重击，如果又投出19或20，便可继续花费耐力进行确认和提升重击倍数，如此往复。
